title: CIS User Profile
description:
A user profile for a user managed by CIS.  Objects of this type are generated from information provided by identity providers (IdP's).

Fields identified as authoritative can be relied on for identification and access control purposes; fields identified as informational should not be relied on for crticical operations but may be used to support interaction with the user.

user_id.description: (Authoritative) The user ID as defined by the underlying IdP. Profile consumers should not try to interpret this value in any way, but may use it as a stable identifier for this user as identified by this IDP.

timezone.description: (Informational) Timezone name for this user's typical location, e.g., 'Europe/London'.

active.description: (Authoritative) If false, all access for this user should be denied. Profile consumers MUST check this value and disregard the remainder of the profile if false.

displayName.description: (Informational) Human-readable full name for this user

firstName.description: (Informational) Human-readable first name (surname) for this user

lastName.description: (Informational) Human-readable last (family) name for this user

preferredLanguage.description: (Informational) Preferred language for this user, as a locale code such as `en_US`

primaryEmail.description: (Informational) The primary email address at which the user may be reached.  Profile consumers may use this email to communicate with the user, but should not use it as a stable identifier for the user.

emails.description: (Informational) All email addresses associated with this user's profile. Order is undefined.

verified.description: If true, then there is some assurance (such as via a confirmation code) that this email address belongs to the user. Otherwise, the value is entirely user-supplied.

primary.description: If true, this is the user's primary email and thus matches `profile.primaryEmail`.

phoneNumbers.description: (Informational) All phone numbers associated with this user's profile.  Order is undefined.

value.description: The phone number. Format is undefined.

verified.description: If true, then there is some assurance (such as via a confirmation code) that this phone number belongs to the user. Otherwise, the value is entirely user-supplied.

picture.description: (Informational) The URL of an image representing this user.

shirtSize.description: (Informational) Shirt size for this user. Format undefined.

authoritativeGroups.description: (Authoritative) A list of user-groups of which this user is a member. The group names are specific to the IdP, so profile consumers should take the IdP into account when interpreting this information. Note that the identity of the IdP is not available in the profile.

created.description: Date the user became a member of this group

name.description: Name of the group, as given by the IdP.

uuid.description: Reserved; profile providers should not use this value.
